content: What 1984 film starring Bill Murray, Dan Aykroyd, and Harold Ramis involves a team of parapsychologists who start a ghost-catching business in New York City?

I believe the film you're referring to is "Ghostbusters." It was released in 1984 and features Bill Murray, Dan Aykroyd, and Harold Ramis as a team of parapsychologists who start a ghost-catching business in New York City. The movie was a huge success and spawned a franchise including sequels, television shows, and merchandise.
